trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is directed to examine the body of an unbuffered message.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.NavigatorInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.NavigatorInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.NavigatorInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> class with data that specifies the source and destination of the stream and the information required to serialize the exception.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains all the data required to serialize the exception.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that specifies the source and destination of the stream.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.NavigatorInvalidBodyAccessException"></xref> class with a specified error message and the inner exception that caused the current exception.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> that caused the current exception to be thrown.
